Control Name: 3.9.5 The health model can determine if the workload is performing at the expected targets.
Control Statement: The health model should have the ability to evaluate application performance as a part of the application's overall health state.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.9 How have you modeled the health of your workload?
control_attributes.Control: 3.9.5 The health model can determine if the workload is performing at the expected targets.
control_attributes.Description: The health model should have the ability to evaluate application performance as a part of the application's overall health state.
